TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SKMatrix extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: A 3x3 transformation matrix with perspective.
Docs.remarks: It extends the traditional 2D affine transformation matrix with three perspective components that allow simple 3D effects to be created with it. Those components must be manually set by using the , , fields of the matrix.

Docs.summary: Concatenates the specified matrices into the resulting target matrix.
Docs.remarks: Either source matrices can also be the target matrix.

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPoint MapVector(float32 x, float32 y) cil managed

Docs.summary: Applies the matrix to a vector, ignoring translation.
Docs.remarks: Mapping vectors ignores the translation component in the matrix. Use to take the translation into consideration.

Docs.param: The array of vectors to map.

Docs.returns: Returns the new array allocated with the mapped results.
Docs.remarks: Mapping vectors ignores the translation component in the matrix. Use to take the translation into consideration.

The array of vectors to map.
Docs.summary: Apply the to the array of vectors and return the mapped results..
Docs.remarks: Mapping vectors ignores the translation component in the matrix. Use to take the translation into consideration.

Docs.param: The destination value to store the inverted matrix if the matrix can be inverted.

Docs.returns: True if the matrix can be inverted, and the inverse parameter is initialized with the inverted matrix, false otherwise.
